sentences.sContent: The jury were sequestered during the trial.
sentences.sCn: 审判期间，陪审团被隔离开来。

synos.tran: 使隔绝；使隐退；没收，扣押

remMethod.val: 隐居 (sequester) 是为了寻求 (quest) 平静

words.tran: 扣押（sequester的过去分词）；使…隐退；使…分开

trans.tranCn: 使隔绝；使隐退；没收，扣押
trans.tranOther: to keep a person or a group of people away from other people
